forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 53. West southwest wind 7 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
Today, Downtown San Francisco greets its inhabitants with golden rays peeking through a mostly sunny sky, offering a delightful respite from the typical fog that often clings to the city. Though the temperature is set to hover around a cool 62 degrees, the gentle west-southwest wind adds a playful twist, whispering through the streets at 14 mph and bringing occasional gusts that dance through the air. As the afternoon unfolds, the warmth of the sun will likely coax the temperature down to a comfortable 60—an invitation for a stroll along the waterfront or through the city's charming alleys.

As the evening descends, clouds will begin to gather, shrouding the sky in a veil that mirrors the marine layer teasingly seen creeping towards the coast. The forecast predicts a low of around 53 degrees, so layering up with a light jacket or sweater will ensure you remain cozy during early evening outings or contemplative walks in the park. Embracing the tranquil ambiance of the city today feels particularly appropriate—perhaps a quiet afternoon sipping coffee in a cozy café or leisurely browsing a local bookstore. The shifting clouds and gentle breezes suggest a cinematic quality to the evening, perfect for reflective moments or engaging conversation.
